name: Summits Alert
author: Ivan Eisenberg

sections.description: A lightweight plugin that allows you to place a sitewide alert message in the header of your site. There are options to include a default set of styles (based on Twitter Bootstrap), center your alert, and switch the style class.
sections.installation:
1. Install the plugin though the WordPress plugin interface.
  2. Configure the plugin in Settings > Site Alert
  3. Enjoy.
sections.faq:
Where do I configure the plugin?

You will find a menu option in the ‘settings’ admin menu entitled Site Alert.
